children.summary: Gets the trait values associated with this test method (and the test class, test collection, and test assembly). If there are none, or the framework does not support traits, this returns an empty dictionary (not null).

content.value: public string UniqueID { get; }
Public ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String

children.remarks: The unique identifier for a test method should be able to discriminate among test methods in the same test assembly. This identifier should remain stable until such time as the developer changes some fundamental part of the identity (assembly, collection, test class, or test method). Recompilation of the test assembly is reasonable as a stability changing event.
children.summary: Gets the unique ID for this test method.

summary: The default implementation of for xUnit.net v3 based on .
